sentences: Contact group Co-Chairs Emily Ojoo-Massawa (Kenya) and Jozef Buys (Belgium) reported that, despite some progress, delegates had been unable to reach agreement.
SBI forwarded the conclusions as presented (FCCC/SBI/2005/L.13), which contained a number of brackets.
SBI Chair Becker urged delegates to arrive at COP 11 with more flexible mandates to allow for an agreement.
The EU reiterated support for the SCCF, noted that the EU has already pledged US$35 million, and said he will work with the GEF to ensure the SCCF is implemented properly.
enb_long_title: United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change: Twenty-Second Session of the Subsidiary Bodies
